values: well ... its safe to say that i never ever update this thing anymore. i guess its just too much for me.. yeah i know lazy fuck. wuhtever.. i guess during the school year this will just be a kind of update every now and then whereas in the summer i update like ... twice a day. You nosy kids will just have to learn to deal without my private life. Okay, so today was thanksgiving. And let me just tell you, it sucked. It's not even like anything major happened to upset me. The holidays in general just depress me i guess. i hate it. i fight with liek everyone and i get wicked pissed off and i usually end up crying for some stupid reason. blahhh... so i slept at minori's last night and we woke uup early and went to the thanksgiving game, the last game at manning bowl. And yes we won fortunately. but then after Meggan dropped me off my mom told me we werent going to my grandmas till like 2:30. So i was really hungry and impatient. Fell asleep for like 2 hours, and woke up in a really grumpy mood. Didn't eat till like 5.. sat around... i duno i just can't really explain why i felt so upset today. I hate holidays because i have to make like a million trips to everywhere. and if i dont visit one parent.. thats it im the guiltiest worst kid in the world. and then i hear shit from both of them. just wonderful. The best thing that happened to me today was my grandma telling me her and my grandpa were guna take me shopping for my xmas present tomorrow. which thank god is going to be a brand new car. So that made me a little happier. They are guna make the payments till i graduate... but hopefully i will get a good job soon and i can help them out.. and feel a little better about getting the car. so yeah.. i can pick any car i want at a reasonable price. after that tomorrow i get to spend the whole day cleaning and packing up the rest of my room/house. then i will probably have to go with my mom or chris to the new house and bring boxes up. I HATE MOVING. seriously... if she moves me one more time before i graduate.. i really wont go with her. its off to my grandma's for me. the amazing thing is how she complains about it to me now. like it was my suggestion to move and it was this big pain for her. yeah.. wuhtever, dumbness i tell ya. i need to schedule road lessons damnit and set up an appointment for my road test. its guna be snowing soon. wonderful. i dont even no why i make these dumb retarded melodramatic updates. pay no attention to me.. it is rambling and venting. so go ahead roll your eyes and yell drama queen... cuz i cant hear you <3

i never update as much a i used too. im too busy all the time. and plus very lazy. Jessica is gone to South Carolina till monday, so i am lost without her. i told her to buy me a keychain :). tomorrow is friday. this week went by reasonably fast. i had a few tests that i did alrite on.. except for algebra. Mr. Rosen needs to just leave, because i hate him. i have a really bad grade in his class. but i cant help it if he was out for like 2 weeks. whatever i will fix it eventually. i went to the mall with my mom and chris tonight. i honestly don't get all of this, tonight was so normal. we just went to the mall cuz my mom had to find a dress for the policemans ball tomorrow. and we had fun. i just dont understand. Bad news has been coming in the bundle lately. My mom came in my room and told me that my aunt was in the hospital. i thought maybe she just hurt herself or sumthing but my mom told me it was for depression. that kinda blew me away.. depression.. she always seems so happy to mee, and she has a little girl and it just upset me. i asked why but my mother wouldnt explain. so i am assuming it is sumthing i wouldnt want to hear about. so i think i will keep it that way. sometimes i am better off not knowing. get better soon aunty. 

tomorrow is my grandma's birthday. and i think i am going with nicole and minori to get meggan a birthday present. saturday i am doing an escorting thing in nahant. i think i am meeting john kerry? lol that should be interesting. and i think the assisstant commandant of the marine corps. word. sat. night out to dinner for meg and robos bdays. good times ahead hopefully. well i got a million things to do tonight.so catch you later.

sometimes making the best of things is the most important thing you can do in some situations. and honestly i'm trying. but i don't see how any of this is possibly going to work. 

I came home from dad's early today to do some cleaning and chris was home. we really havn't brought up the subject at all. and he just acted like it was nothing. he asked me if i was upset about it and i said yeah alot. but it wasn't going to do anything so what was the point. and i had to make up some dumb excuse to go in the other room so i didn't start to cry in front of him. why does it upset me so much.. its driving me insane. he isn't just another one of her boyfriends. he has been there for me, and he told me he still wants to be there for me, and that just made me feel ten times worse. i know nothing i say will make things different, so whenever my mom tries to "talk" to me about how i feel i just put up a happy front like moving is going to be this great big new start for us. but i hate it. but she's so happy about it. this all makes me sick.

school is horrible. i want nothing to do with any drama of any sort. i have my own priorities that i need to straighten out. sorry. i think everything is just ridiculous right now. i'm only sixteen and a lot older than some people, and these people have so many crazy problems that i could never even imagine having to deal with. it really scares me sumtimes. just live life at a normal pace people, stop rushing to grow up. yeah im a hypocrite i know, i always complain about being in high school and wanting to go to college. but honestly, theres a difference between wishing something would hurry up and happen, and actually rushing yourself and regretting it.

i took the PSAT's saturday. that was pure hell. i missed a few math ones. whatever i am over it. i hate timed tests.. i screw up because i know i only have limited time. oh well maybe i will do better on the next one.  

friday was jessica's birthday. Happy birthday jess i love you. your getting so old pretty soon u can take me off lay away ;)

tomorrow is roberts birthday. happy birthday robo, i made you such a pretty sign. you will love it, i promise.

|-all i can think of now is that something really good needs to happen to me soon, or i just give up. 

|-i also hate driving with a passion, and i dont know how i will ever pass my road test.
 
|-and to finish it off.. this week needs to go by as fast as possible, and i mean it.

i know i havn't updated for a few days. which has become a record for me. But it has been extremely hectic and when im not busy i am probably crashing and getting sleep. the last few days have been exhausting. Friday night i went to the mall and the movies with jessica. we saw Ladder 49 and we bought some outfits. i'm awesome and i bought a shirt and a pair of pants for 9 dollars in total. then saturday i went to look at the apartment with my mom. my dad attempted to take me to the fair but it was so busy that we just gave up and drove home. later that day the gang all went up there so i joined them and we got in alrite. it was so crowded. it wasnt the greatest, but i did have fun. robert locked his car keys in the car at like 11:00 at night at johns roast beef. lol we were on our way to some dumb party and we were stuck. it was pretty funny. like 10 of us had to get in annie's van and drive to his house to get the spare key. so then sunday i had to wake up early to march in the Columbus Day parade in east boston. argh that was hell. it was so freakin long and i wanted to die.. my throat was killing so i couldnt even command right and we were just horrible. so after that krap was over i went to my dads and passed out for an hour then ran home and showered and got ready for the palace. as tired as i was i have to say that i had so much god damn fun. i don't care how tacky and cheesy that place is.. it is a good place to go to get ur mind off things. i just danced and had fun with my friends. and danced in a tub of bubbles.. yeah it was amazing. so that was good and then jess slept over and the next day i slept wicked late and layed around and then i went to my grandparents and just chilled. it was so good to go there and just relax. 

Sunday when i got home from the parade my mom was home. she was extremely perky and so i knew something was up. the lady had called her..and we got the apartment. So now i am moving, in like 30 days. I have like 30 days to pack up all this shit and move. arghh.. its like the worst time in the world for this to start happening. i dont care im still going away in the beginning of november. i'll pack before that. i need that vacation desperately. i can't wait. pennsylvania here i come..  

tomorrow is uniform day and i dont want to wear it but i will deal. im so scared tomorrow is my first road lesson. i dont want to drive.. i hate it. so im just hoping to god that goes alrite. 

i am so tired.. i am always tired.. 

i love my bed.

the end.

In other news, i went to the Dermatologist today. Yes, she did the light therapy again. I hate it so much, but luckily this was my last time for the treatment. This time the lady was so nice and i am glad she did it becuz she tried to be extra careful and she actually talked to me. i wish she did it all the other times too. It is very red right now but i have a feeling this might help. Well it's not a feeling, it is more of a hope. I try everything and really nothing ever works. And the worst part of it is how they make everything seem like it will work, and then i end up getting my hopes up. Then the medication fails and i end up either looking the same or worse. Talk about bad self image. I don't know, i just really need this thing to work for me.. i can't take any more of this stuff. It's to the point of pain when i go there. Today in the office she had to rub acetone on my face and i started to cry. Yes acetone, it was horrible and the stinging pain was unbelievable. I just feel like if this time doesn't work, that i have just been exposing myself to all this pain and for nothing. Also i would feel like i threw all my mom's money out the window. She does so much to help and i feel bad cuz it doesn't work and i feel like im wasting her time/money. Damn you genetics.
